recipe.title: One-pot Pasta Primavera Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups ; broth, of your choice ; (960 mL)
1 lb ; asparagus, chopped into 1-inch (2 cm) pieces ; (455 g)
¼ cup ; heavy whipping cream ; (60 mL)
½ cup ; grated parmesan cheese ; (55 g)

steps.step: In a pot over high heat, combine broth, linguine, broccoli, asparagus, onion, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, and olive oil. Stir.
Add the mushrooms and bring to a boil.
Once at a boil, reduce heat to medium and cook the pasta for 10 minutes, continuously tossing with tongs.
Add the heavy cream, parmesan, and parsley, and toss for an additional 3 minutes.
If the liquid hasn’t been completely absorbed, let the pasta sit off the heat for an additional few minutes.
